sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Util-linux package contains the agetty, arch, blockdev, cal, cfdisk, chkdupexe, col, colcrt, colrm, column, ctrlaltdel, cytune, ddate, dmesg, elvtune, fdformat, fdisk, fsck.minix, getopt, hexdump, hwclock, ipcrm, ipcs, kill, logger, look, losetup, mcookie, mkfs, mkfs.bfs, mkfs.minix, mkswap, more, mount, namei, umount, ramsize, rdev, readprofile, rename, renice, rev, rootflags, script, setfdprm, setsid, setterm, sfdisk, swapdev, swapoff, swapon, tunelp, ul, vidmode, whereis, and write programs.

sect3.title: agetty
sect3.para: agetty opens a tty port, prompts for a login name and invokes the /bin/login command.

sect3.title: arch
sect3.para: arch prints the machine architecture.

sect3.title: blockdev
sect3.para: blockdev allows to call block device ioctls from the command line

sect3.title: cal
sect3.para: cal displays a simple calender.

sect3.title: cfdisk
sect3.para: cfdisk is an libncurses based disk partition table manipulator.

sect3.title: chkdupexe
sect3.para: chkdupexe finds duplicate executables.

sect3.title: col
sect3.para: col filters reverse line feeds from input.

sect3.title: colcrt
sect3.para: colcrt filters nroff output for CRT previewing.

sect3.title: colrm
sect3.para: colrm removes columns from a file.

sect3.title: column
sect3.para: column columnates lists.

sect3.title: ctrlaltdel
sect3.para: ctrlaltdel sets the function of the CTRL+ALT+DEL key combination (hard or soft reset).

sect3.title: cytune
sect3.para: cytune queries and modifies the interruption threshold for the Cyclades driver.

sect3.title: ddate
sect3.para: ddate converts Gregorian dates to Discordian dates.

sect3.title: dmesg
sect3.para: dmesg is used to examine or control the kernel ring buffer (boot messages from the kernel).

sect3.title: elvtune
sect3.para: elvtune allows to tune the I/O elevator per block device queue basis.

sect3.title: fdformat
sect3.para: fdformat low-level formats a floppy disk.

sect3.title: fdisk
sect3.para: fdisk is a disk partition table manipulator.

sect3.title: fsck.minix
sect3.para: fsck.minix performs a consistency check for the Linux MINIX filesystem.

sect3.title: getopt
sect3.para: getops parses command options the same way as the getopt C command.

sect3.title: hexdump
sect3.para: hexdump displays specified files, or standard input, in a user specified format (ascii, decimal, hexadecimal, octal).

sect3.title: hwclock
sect3.para: hwclock queries and sets the hardware clock (Also called the RTC or BIOS clock).

sect3.title: ipcrm
sect3.para: ipcrm removes a specified resource.

sect3.title: ipcs
sect3.para: ipcs provides information on IPC facilities.

sect3.title: kill
sect3.para: kill sends a specified signal to the specified process.

sect3.title: logger
sect3.para: logger makes entries in the system log.

sect3.title: look
sect3.para: look displays lines beginning with a given string.

sect3.title: losetup
sect3.para: losetup sets up and controls loop devices.

sect3.title: mcookie
sect3.para: mcookie generates magic cookies for xauth.

sect3.title: mkfs
sect3.para: mkfs builds a Linux filesystem on a device, usually a harddisk partition.

sect3.title: mkfs.bfs
sect3.para: mkfs.bfs creates a SCO bfs file system on a device, usually a harddisk partition.

sect3.title: mkfs.minix
sect3.para: mkfs.minix creates a Linux MINIX filesystem on a device, usually a harddisk partition.

sect3.title: mkswap
sect3.para: mkswap sets up a Linux swap area on a device or in a file.

sect3.title: more
sect3.para: more is a filter for paging through text one screen full at a time.

sect3.title: mount
sect3.para: mount mounts a filesystem from a device to a directory (mount point).

sect3.title: namei
sect3.para: namei follows a pathname until a terminal point is found.

sect3.title: umount
sect3.para: umount unmounts a mounted filesystem.

sect3.title: ramsize
sect3.para: ramsize queries and sets RAM disk size.

sect3.title: rdev
sect3.para: rdev queries and sets image root device, swap device, RAM disk size, or video mode.

sect3.title: readprofile
sect3.para: readprofile reads kernel profiling information.

sect3.title: rename
sect3.para: rename renames files.

sect3.title: renice
sect3.para: renice alters priority of running processes.

sect3.title: rev
sect3.para: rev reverses lines of a file.

sect3.title: rootflags
sect3.para: rootflags queries and sets extra information used when mounting root.

sect3.title: script
sect3.para: script makes typescript of terminal session.

sect3.title: setfdprm
sect3.para: setfdprm sets user-provides floppy disk parameters.

sect3.title: setsid
sect3.para: setsid runs programs in a new session.

sect3.title: setterm
sect3.para: setterm sets terminal attributes.

sect3.title: sfdisk
sect3.para: sfdisk is a disk partition table manipulator.

sect3.title: swapdev
sect3.para: swapdev queries and sets swap device.

sect3.title: swapoff
sect3.para: swapoff disables devices and files for paging and swapping.

sect3.title: swapon
sect3.para: swapon enables devices and files for paging and swapping.

sect3.title: tunelp
sect3.para: tunelp sets various parameters for the LP device.

sect3.title: ul
sect3.para: ul reads a file and translates occurrences of underscores to the sequence which indicates underlining for the terminal in use.

sect3.title: vidmode
sect3.para: vidmode queries and sets the video mode.

sect3.title: whereis
sect3.para: whereis locates a binary, source and manual page for a command.

sect3.title: write
sect3.para: write sends a message to another user.
